about_the_game:
Welcome to Cats in Cozy Rooms, where creativity and charm collide! Step into the world of feline interior design as you decorate rooms for cute cat clients. Each cat comes with a unique personality, preferences, and a set budget. Your challenge? To pick and place the perfect items that match their tastes—whether it’s a music lover’s melody-filled room or a bookworm’s literary haven—all while staying within budget.

With endless design possibilities, budget-friendly challenges, and heartwarming feline feedback, Cats in Cozy Rooms is the purr-fect game for creativity lovers and cat enthusiasts alike. Dive in and design today!
detailed_description:

To pick and place the perfect items that match their tastes—whether it’s a music lover’s melody-filled room or a bookworm’s literary haven—all while staying within budget.

With endless design possibilities, budget-friendly challenges, and heartwarming feline feedback, Cats in Cozy Rooms is the purr-fect game for creativity lovers and cat enthusiasts alike. Dive in and design today!
name: Cats in Cozy Rooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.2GHz Dual Core +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Good One
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Unleash your inner designer in Cats in Cozy Rooms! Help adorable cat clients create their dream spaces by decorating rooms tailored to their unique tastes and budgets. Will you craft the purr-fect cozy room?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
